definition: 12th earthly branch: 9-11 p.m., 10th solar month (7th November-6th December), year of the Boar/ancient Chinese compass point: 330°

sentences.english: s2 And, in this case, I start with helium -is 1s2.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況心愛，氦開始的是。

sentences.english: Helium is a gas used in balloons.
sentences.chinese: 氦是一種用於氣球的氣體。

sentences.english: Did the star ignite helium at the core, swallow a planet, or swallow a companion star?
sentences.chinese: 星體燃燒了核內的氦，吞併了行星或伴星嗎？

sentences.english: Combining the helium and hyperoxia slows down the frequency of breathing while making the air easier to breathe.
sentences.chinese: 氦氧聯用減慢了呼吸頻率從而使空氣更容易呼出。

sentences.english: The feasibility of using quadropole mass spectroscopy to differentiate helium and deuterium was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論和測量如何利用質譜計來分氦和氘。

sentences.english: The moon's lunar soil is chock-full of helium reserves, thanks to the solar wind.
sentences.chinese: 由於太陽風，月壤充滿了氦。

sentences.english: Clearly, helium has the least polarizable electron cloud.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，氦的可極化電子雲最小。

sentences.english: Helium and argon are monatomic gases.
sentences.chinese: 氦和氬都是單原子氣體。

sentences.english: The Sun is rich in helium, as are the solar system’s gas giant planets.
sentences.chinese: 太陽作爲太陽系中的氣體巨行星，氦含量豐富。

sentences.english: Single-ion helium occurs when one electron is lost.
sentences.chinese: 單浪子氦在失蹤去一個電子時呈現。

sentences.english: HIM can pro- vide excellent imaging without the need for conductive coatings.
sentences.chinese: 氦離子顯微鏡無需導電塗層就可以提供極好的成像。

sentences.english: After treatment of argon-helium knife, tumor was shrunken to 5cm.
sentences.chinese: 經過氬氦刀治療以後，腫瘤只剩下5公分。
啓動下降段開始氦加壓。

sentences.english: Helium gas was the thermometric fluid.
sentences.chinese: 氦和氬都是單原子氣體。

sentences.english: The wished to locate its new factory beside the river.
sentences.chinese: 這家公司希望毖崖氦敞砷在河邊。

definition: deuterium 2H/heavy hydrogen, isotope of hydrogen having 1 neutron in its nucleus, so atomic weight 2
tritium 3H/radioactive isotope of hydrogen having 2 neutrons in its nucleus, so atomic weight 3
protium 1H/light hydrogen, the most common isotope of hydrogen, having no neutron, so atomic weight 1
